trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Yuba City
There were no other sightings in Yuba City on or around May 9th 2013
Summary: Observation of white disc in sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe observation was made while working in the garden. The time was 3:00pm and the object was a pointer finger (from suns center) at one o'clock. The object was visable for two hours and ended up at the 11 position at five o'clock and two pointer fingers from the suns center. During this time period the object turned color (blue,orange,green) white pieces drifted out of the object. At one point two identical objects sped past.The object was a bright white, soft edges, very slow moving,round, and white. A bright white, like viewing a first magnitute star in daylight. It moved in a clockwise direction starting at 1:00 and last observed at the 11:00 position. Photographs show six objects. Two airforce fighter aircraft flew by as did a commercial passenger plane. Sight was lost when cloud cover moved in. The object was observed when our grandson looked up and wanted to known whats that. Our reaction was to grab cameras and take pictues and sit and watch. Told neighbors to look at the objects.
